property.name: onDocumentReadyScript
onClickScript
property.value: var submitOptions = {data:{methodToCall:'validateCart',atpId:jQuery(this).data('atpid'),courseId:jQuery(this).data('courseid')}}; jQuery('#kualiForm').ajaxSubmit(submitOptions);

property.name: onClickScript
property.value: var submitOptions = {data:{methodToCall:'enrollCart',atpId:jQuery(this).data('atpid'),courseId:jQuery(this).data('courseid')}}; jQuery('#kualiForm').ajaxSubmit(submitOptions);

bean.p:messageText: Will be moved out of the cart credit total and into the planned credit total
Will be moved out of the cart credit total

property.name: onClickScript
property.value: var additionalFormData = {viewId:'PlannedCourse-FormView', methodToCall:'plannedToCart', planItemId:jQuery(this).data('planitemid')}; submitHiddenForm('plan', additionalFormData, e);

bean.p:messageText: Will be moved out of the Total Credit
Will be moved below the Total Credit line
Will be moved out of the Total Credit
Will be moved above the Total Credit line

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:messageText: Create your plan by finding and adding courses to any term.

property.name: layoutManager.lineGroupPrototype.style
property.value: width:@{588/T(org.kuali.student.ap.framework.config.KsapFrameworkServiceLocator).getTermHelper().getNumberOfTermsInAcademicYear()}px; margin:0 @{20/T(org.kuali.student.ap.framework.config.KsapFrameworkServiceLocator).getTermHelper().getNumberOfTermsInAcademicYear()}px;

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript
header.render
property.value: @{#line.completedTerm or #line.academicRecord.size() gt 0 or !#line.openForPlanning}

bean.p:tooltipContent: @{#parentLine.completedTerm and #parentLine.displayCompletedHelp ? 'A completed term you registered for.' : 'A course you have enrolled in for current or future academic term(s).'}

property.name: onClickScript
property.value: openMenu('@{#line.uuid}_completed','completed_menu_items','@{#line.atpId}',e,'.uif-collectionItem','uif-boxLayoutHorizontalItem ks-plan-ContextMenu',{tail:{align:'top'},align:'top',position:'right'},false);

property.name: messageText
property.value: @{#line.courseCode} @{#line.activityCode}

property.name: header.render
property.value: @{#line.completedTerm or #line.academicRecord.size() gt 0 or !#line.openForPlanning}

bean.p:title: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseCode + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseCode + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}
bean.p:altText: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseCode + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseCode + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}

property.name: messageText
property.value: @{#line.campusCode} @{#line.courseCode} @{#line.activityCode}

bean.p:title: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseCode + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseCode + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}
bean.p:altText: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseCode + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseCode + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}

property.name: messageText
property.value: @{#line.campusCode} @{#line.courseCode} @{#line.activityCode}

bean.p:title: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseCode + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseCode + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}
bean.p:altText: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseCode + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseCode + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}
